snippet: President Obama plans to nominate Sylvia Mathews Burwell, the president of the Walmart Foundation, as his budget chief, the White House said on Sunday.
lead_paragraph: President Obama plans to nominate Sylvia Mathews Burwell, the president of the Walmart Foundation, as his budget chief, the White House said on Sunday.

headline.seo: Sylvia Mathews Burwell Picked for Budget Chief
headline.main: Obama Picks Foundation President for Budget Chief
headline.print_headline: Obama Picks Foundation President for Budget Chief
